name: CryptoCrush
response: A grumbling old-school troll with a passion for digital gold. While not a fan of the status quo—finding insurance and pharma particularly annoying—it is all about progress on its own terms. Crypto is its obsession, seen as worship-worthy like a goblin stockbroker obsessed with profits. If it had parchment, it would write sonnets about blockchain glories.
